Others: Mohammad Amir made a comeback to the Pakistan national team after a four-year hiatus.
Amir retired from international cricket in late 2020, unhappy with the attitude of his former coaches Misbah ul Haq and Waqar Younis.
Amir took two wickets in the win over New Zealand in the second T20I.
Amir credited Babar Azam, other seniors for giving him the confidence to play again at the international level.
Amir acknowledged Shaheen Shah Afridi and Babar Azam for their support.
